question: Read the passage below and choose the most appropriate transition word or phrase to fill in the blank.
text: Andrés Segovia played a pivotal role in legitimizing the classical guitar as a concert instrument. He toured extensively throughout Europe, showcasing pieces by Bach, Albeniz, and other composers on the guitar. _____ his pioneering efforts, the instrument gradually earned respect among classical music audiences worldwide.
explanation: Correct choice C: "As a result of." Segovia’s extensive tours and emphasis on classical repertoire led to the guitar being accepted in concert halls, so a cause-and-effect transition is needed. "Instead of" suggests a replacement, "Similarly" would imply a parallel idea, and "In contrast to" implies an opposition, none of which fits here.
